AND ?

SELECT * FROM( SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_IMG, R.REGION_NAME AS REGION_NAME , C.CATEGORY_NAME as CATEGORY_NAME, START_DATE, END_DATE,STATUS,STAY,A_PRICE, C_PRICE,AMOUNT, FLIGHT,INFO_EDITOR, SCHEDULE_EDITOR, DETAIL_EDITOR, REGISTRATION_DATE, MODIFICATION_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PRODUCT_ID) as RNUM FROM PRODUCT P JOIN PRO_CATEGORY C ON C.CATEGORY_ID=P.CATEGORY_ID JOIN REGION R ON R.REGION_ID=P.REGION_ID) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND CATEGORY_NAME = ?

SELECT P.PRODUCT_ID , P.PRODUCT_NAME , P.PRODUCT_IMG , P.START_DATE , P.END_DATE , P.A_PRICE , C.CATEGORY_NAME FROM PRODUCT P JOIN PRO_CATEGORY C ON P.CATEGORY_ID = C.CATEGORY_ID WHERE C.CATEGORY_NAME = ? ORDER BY P.PRODUCT_ID DESC
INSERT INTO FAVORITES (USER_NO, PRODUCT_ID, ADDED_DATE) VALUES (?, ?, SYSDATE)
DELETE FROM FAVORITES WHERE USER_NO = ? AND PRODUCT_ID = ?
SELECT PRODUCT_ID FROM FAVORITES WHERE USER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO REVIEW (REVIEW_NO, USER_NO, CONTENT, RATING, WRITE_DATE, MERCHANT_UID) VALUES (SEQ_REVIEW.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE, 'MER_UID6')

SELECT R.REVIEW_NO, R.USER_NO, R.CONTENT, R.RATING, R.WRITE_DATE, P.PRODUCT_ID FROM REVIEW R JOIN "ORDER" O ON R.MERCHANT_UID = O.MERCHANT_UID JOIN PRODUCT P ON O.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID WHERE P.PRODUCT_ID = ?

SELECT P.PRODUCT_ID, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_IMG, P.START_DATE, P.END_DATE, P.A_PRICE, P.C_PRICE, P.STATUS, P.STAY, C.CATEGORY_NAME FROM PRODUCT P JOIN PRO_CATEGORY C ON P.CATEGORY_ID = C.CATEGORY_ID WHERE (C.CATEGORY_NAME = ? OR ? IS NULL) AND (P.STATUS = ? OR ? IS NULL) AND (P.STAY = ? OR ? IS NULL)
